duties_responsibilities.duty: Design and build high-volume real-time data ingestion and processing frameworks and advanced analytics on big data platforms.
Lead the implementation of Hadoop platform strategy development and provide architecture recommendations.
Present technology solutions to senior leadership and influence architecture decisions that drive the transformation of Connected Car analytics platform.
Research the tool market, follow new research streams, and build partnerships with start-ups, universities, and local communities.
Communicate complex architectures and insights in a clear, precise, and actionable manner.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science Engineering or related field
